lines.text: My poor mother came to see me off.

[Amused]
Mine was too drunk to come.
Well, Mr. Pip, if you want to become a gentleman, the sooner you leave this house, the better.
Abel Magwitch shall not die on the gallows, Mr. Pirrip.
Before Miss Havisham died, she told me her teachings were false... that love is worth all the suffering and pain that goes with it.
You once told me that you loved me, Pip.
